Detailed Description

template<unsigned D, unsigned Dmin>
class Torate< D, Dmin, Dmin >

Specialization of Torate<D,Dmin,Dmax> to end recursion.

Parameters:
D Dimension of the vector space we're working in
Dmin Dimension being torateed into
Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>
